Name: Rusty
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
45 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
7.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Sherry and rum combine harmoniously with the smoky Islay malt highlighting spicy notes.
History: Created in December 2008 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Originally made using Zacapa 23 rum.
Nutrition: One serving of Rusty contains 218 calories
